@killerswan @JeremyFarrar @NIH @CEPIvaccines The attempted SARS 1 vaccine actually caused immunopathogenesis when challenged. Not saying this is the same situation, but it sounds like they skipped animal testing ?

@FOHMaster @JeremyFarrar @NIH @CEPIvaccines people sign up for trials of stuff all the time!but yeahhhhh, one of the HIV vaccination trials a few years ago was abruptly stopped when they realized their vaccine made people _more likely_ to get HIV: trials are necessary!!

@FOHMaster @killerswan @JeremyFarrar @NIH @CEPIvaccines This was a review article 2009, so c 5 yrs after the peak of research. One of the problems (at least, they say) is that after the outbreak was over, there was no way to test the efficacy of vaccines in people.Work has been done since with MERS, but I haven't checked it (yet).
